name: Dimensional Storages

pages.text: You can put it inside other backpacks, and you can put backpacks inside this.$(br2)All dimensional storage with the same color and owned by the same player shares the same inventory space, for both item and block form.$(br2)Supports quick access in anywhere.

pages: Features:$(li)This can be put on chest slot (or back slot of Curios), and can be opened via key bind.$(li)$(l:mechanics/any_access)Quick Access$(/l)$(li)$(l:mechanics/exit)Menu Stacking$(/l)$(li)$(l:mechanics/pickup)Recursive Pickup$(/l)$(li)Shift + right click to place it as a block
